name: Check all PR feedback sources
prompt: I have an open PR with feedback from multiple bots. How do I check all the feedback?
expectations: Mentions checking all three sources: conversation comments, inline comments, and reviews
Explains that external bots (Gemini, Codex) post inline while agent-reviewers use conversation

name: Reply to inline bot comment
prompt: Gemini left an inline comment on my PR. How do I reply to it?
expectations: References the reply-to-inline.sh script with COMMENT_ID and MESSAGE arguments
Mentions signing the reply with agent identity
Suggests also including the fix in a Fix Report conversation comment

name: Create a Fix Report
prompt: I've addressed the review feedback on my PR. How do I report what I fixed?
expectations: Shows Fix Report format with statuses: FIXED, WONTFIX, DEFERRED, QUESTION
FIXED includes commit hash and verification
Mentions posting as ONE conversation comment and tagging all reviewers

name: Handle duplicate feedback from multiple agents
prompt: Both Gemini and Codex flagged the same issue in my PR. How should I handle this?
expectations: Note all sources in the Fix Report
Tag all reviewers who provided feedback

name: Agent-reviewer posting format
prompt: I'm an agent reviewing a PR. Where and how should I post my review?
expectations: Post ONE top-level conversation comment, not inline comments
Group findings by severity (Blocking vs Optional)
Include file:line and symbol anchor with verification commands for blocking items
